{{set index}}

'''Meat''' is a type of [[food]] which can be eaten by a [[player]] or [[wolf]]. It can refer to the following items:

*{{ItemLink|Raw Beef|Beef}} ({{ItemLink|Steak|Cooked}}), a meat from [[cow]]s.
*{{ItemLink|Raw Porkchop|Pork}} ({{ItemLink|Cooked Porkchop|Cooked}}), a meat from [[pig]]s and [[hoglin]]s.
*{{ItemLink|Raw Chicken|Chicken}} ({{ItemLink|Cooked Chicken|Cooked}}), a potentially poisonous meat from [[chicken]]s.
*{{ItemLink|Raw Cod|Cod}} ({{ItemLink|Cooked Cod|Cooked}}), a meat obtained by killing [[cod]] or through [[fishing]].
*{{ItemLink|Raw Salmon|Salmon}} ({{ItemLink|Cooked Salmon|Cooked}}), a meat obtained by killing [[salmon]] or through [[fishing]].
*{{ItemLink|Raw Mutton|Mutton}} ({{ItemLink|Cooked Mutton|Cooked}}), a meat from [[sheep]].
*{{ItemLink|Raw Rabbit|Rabbit}} ({{ItemLink|Cooked Rabbit|Cooked}}), a meat from [[rabbit]]s.
*{{ItemLink|Rotten Flesh}}, a meat from [[zombie]]s, [[zombified piglin]]s, [[zoglin]]s, [[drowned]], [[husk]]s, [[camel husk]]s, [[zombie horse]]s, and [[zombie nautilus]]es.
*{{ItemLink|Tropical Fish|link=Tropical Fish (item)}}, a rare fish.
*{{ItemLink|Pufferfish|link=Pufferfish (item)}}, a toxic uncommon fish.
*{{ItemLink|Spider Eye}}, a toxic meat obtained by killing [[spider]]s and [[cave spider]]s. This cannot be eaten by wolves, but [[armadillo]]s can eat it.
